author: mattsicker
msg: Add Runnable wrapper method for use with Async Servlets.
- Moved implementation of getLog4jWebInitializer into WebLoggerContextUtils.
- Added WebLoggerContextUtils which is similar to Spring's WebApplicationContextUtils class.
- Added test servlet for later integration testing (also used for example documentation).
